unnormalised: Hey guys, any news on Jasprit Bumrah? Heard he twisted his ankle during practice at Eden Gardens on 12/10/2024. Hope he recovers soon! The World Cup is around the corner. Also, what's the update on Hardik? Last I heard, his back was acting up again. Doctor at AIIMS said he needs rest till 20/10/2024, 17:00 hrs. Tough luck, man. Hoping for some good news by Diwali, 31/10/2024. Let's go India!
normalised: Hey guys, any news on Jasprit Bumrah? Heard he twisted his ankle during practice at Eden Gardens on twelfth october two thousand and twenty four. Hope he recovers soon! The World Cup is around the corner. Also, what's the update on Hardik? Last I heard, his back was acting up again. Doctor at A I I M S said he needs rest till twentieth october two thousand and twenty four, seventeen hundred hours. Tough luck, man. Hoping for some good news by Diwali, thirty first october two thousand and twenty four. Let's go India!
